channel.title: Projects on Data Science Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Data Science Portfolio

item.title: Digit Recognizer - Computer Vision with MNIST data
item.description: Predict over 40,000 handwritten digits Utilized variety of models including MLP, CNN, PCA. Performed PCA to obtain components accounting for 75 % of the total variation Accuracy score of 98% on test data Click HERE for the full analysis of PCA and K-Means Clustering Click HERE for the full analysis of MLP & CNN

item.title: Natural Language Processing with Disaster Tweets
item.description: Predict Tweets are about real disasters Analysis with and without pre-trained word embeddings Utilized recurrent neural network with birectional LSTM Scored top 16% on Kaggle Leaderboard Click HERE for the full analysis

item.title: Home Price Prediction
item.description: Predict home prices in Ames, Iowa Dataset with over 79 features Encoding categocial feautres Utilized regularizatino methods (Ridge, Lasso, ElasticNet) Scored top 11% on Kaggle Competition Click HERE for the full analysis

item.title: Titanic: Survivability Prediction
item.description: Predict survival on the Titanic Utilized gridsearchCV for optimal hyperparametersgradient Analysis using gradient boosting, Random Forest, logistic regression, LDA and KNN Scored top 16% on Kaggle Competition Click HERE for the full analysis using Random Forest Click HERE for the full analysis using Logistic Regression, LDA and K-Nearest Neighbor

item.title: EDA Lead-Time Analysis
item.description: Does distance have a factor on lead-time (On-Time Delivery)? Performed EDA on anonymized supplier receipt data Parts that were shipped within 100 miles were late on average of 1 day Parts more than 300 miles averaged 2.7 days Parts between 100-300 miles averaged 3.5 days Click HERE for the full analysis
